speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, tomorrow, around 11 a.m., the Senate will proceed to a rollcall vote on the motion to concur relative to H.R. 3221, the Foreclosure Prevention Act. Following this vote, the Senate will immediately proceed to vote on the motion to invoke cloture on the motion to proceed to S. 3186, the Warm in Winter and Cool in Summer Act. Senators should expect up to two rollcall votes to begin around 11 a.m. tomorrow.
